text: Lakeland Christian Academy is a private, non-denominational Christian school located in Winona Lake, Indiana. ==Demographics== The demographic breakdown of the 130 students enrolled in 2015-2016 was: *Asian/Pacific islanders - 3.1% *Black - 3.1% *Hispanic - 3.8% *White - 90.0% == Affiliations == *NCA CASI - North Central Association Commission on Accreditation and School Improvement ==See also== * List of high schools in Indiana ==References== == External links == * Category:Christian schools in Indiana Category:Schools in Kosciusko County, Indiana Category:Private schools in Indiana
title: Lakeland Christian Academy (Indiana)
